00021 // for checking memory allocations
00022 #define D_CHECKPTR(p) { \
00023   if(NULL==p){ \
00024     fprintf(stderr, "memory allocation error (%s:%d)\n", __FILE__, __LINE__); \
00025     abort();exit(1); \
00026   } \
00027 }

00030 #ifdef DEBUG
00031 #define D_CHECKRANGE(x,min,max){if(((x)<min)||((x).max)) \
00032   fprintf(stderr, "value out of expected range (%s:%d)\n",__FILE__,__LINE__);}
00033 #else
00034 #define D_CHECKRANGE(x,min,max){}
00035 #endif /* DEBUG*/

00044 #define strncasecmp(string1, string2,length) (_strnicmp((string1), (string2),(length)))
